title: About
description: Hello, my name is Emir, but I'm known on the internet as Kabal. I'm the creator of Kabal's Discord Bot and I'm a freelancer and I've been dealing with these for about 6 years. If you have any project or idea, I would be very happy to help you. All you need to do is to contact me at me@emirkabal.com or check out the social section below.
